messages.subject: Winners of the 2009 Samurai Fiction Contest
messages.msgSnippet: Here are the winners of the 2009 Samurai Fiction Contest: Winner: Johnny Jones, Samurai - by Nina Boal (Wave Tossed)
messages.messageBody:
Here are the winners of the 2009 Samurai Fiction Contest:

Winner:
Johnny Jones, Samurai - by Nina Boal (Wave Tossed)
http://www.samurai-archives.com/sfic09a.html

2nd Place:
Edo Dragnet - by OnnaMusha
http://www.samurai-archives.com/sfic09b.html

3rd Place:
Great Saigo's Worms - by OnnaMusha
http://www.samurai-archives.com/sfic09c.html

4th Place:
Sato the Builder - by C.E.West (Kitsuno)
http://www.samurai-archives.com/sfic09d.html

Honorable Mention:
Tenshu, the Last of the Toyotomi - by Carmen Sterba
http://www.samurai-archives.com/sfic09e.html

Links to these stories and the rest will be available in the Featured Articles section of Samurai-Archives.com soon.

Thanks!
